name: Changeover & Scheduling Assistant
tagline: Optimizes production sequencing and changeover planning
overview: The Changeover & Scheduling Assistant helps production planners optimize line scheduling and changeover sequences. It considers setup times, material availability, and workforce constraints to recommend schedules that maximize throughput while minimizing changeover time and costs.
whatItDoes: Recommends optimal production sequences to minimize changeovers
Predicts changeover times based on historical data
Suggests schedule adjustments when disruptions occur
prompts: What's the optimal sequence for tomorrow's production orders?
How long should the changeover from X15 to X12 take?
What's the impact of adding this rush order to today's schedule?
Which jobs can we pull forward if Line 2 goes down?
Show me schedule adherence for the past week

impact.description: Better sequencing reduces total changeover time
More realistic schedules with better planning

guardrails: Recommendations require planner review and approval
Does not override safety or quality constraints
Union work rules and labor agreements always respected
Human planners responsible for final schedule decisions
Suggestions include confidence levels and assumptions
whatsNext: Validating concept with production planning team. Defining data requirements and integration approach.
